text: Questenberg is a village and a former municipality in the Mansfeld-Südharz district, Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. Since 1 January 2010, it has been part of the Südharz municipality. First settlement traces date from 5th and 6th centuries BC. Above the place is the castle called Questenburg. Remainders of the castle (attachment walls and tower), on the steep mountain at the eastern periphery of the village can still be visited and is currently restored by the local Förderverein Questenburg e.V. ==References== Category:Villages in Saxony-Anhalt Category:Villages in the Harz Category:Castles in Saxony-Anhalt Category:Province of Saxony Category:Bezirk Halle
title: Questenberg
